titleStmt.title: The history of the reformation of the Church of England. The first part of the progess made in it during the reign of K. Henry the VIII / by Gilbert Burnet.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
White, Robert, 1645-1703.

biblFull.extent: [18], 376, [2], 368, [4] p., [7] leaves of plates : ill., ports.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.H. for Richard Chiswell ...,

notesStmt.note: In two parts. Each part has special t.p. ans separate pagination.
"A collection of records and original papers, with other instruments referred to in the former history": p. [1]-304 of the third count.
Includes engraved portraits, by Robert White, of Henry, Catherine of Aragon, Thomas Wolsey, Thomas Cranmer, Anne Boleyn, Thomas Cromwell, and Thomas More.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
